channel.title: Cant weild specific items
channel.description: like i cant put on bandos or anything, and i when im fighting with ags it looks like im throwing knifes, any solutions? like when i put on bcp it puts on as a weapon

item.title: Cant weild specific items
item.dc:creator: @emtscape emtscape
item.description:
@emtscape wrote:

On my server ags code is 15333, so what do i do?

Read full topic

item.title: Cant weild specific items
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

to change the bandos issue go to class8.java in your client folder.
When in there CTRL+F Bandos
When you find the bandos item it should look SOMETHING like this

if(i == 1107) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "+++++"; class8.anInt174 = 4681; class8.anInt181 = 984; class8.anInt190 = 501; class8.anInt198 = 6; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 4; class8.anInt165 = 4682; class8.anInt200 = 4683; class8.anInt164 = 4685; class8.anInt188 = 4684; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Bandos chestplate"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A sturdy chestplate.".getBytes(); }

Change the
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “+++++”;
to
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;

Read full topic

item.title: Cant weild specific items
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

this should be your code in class8 for ags:

if(i == 35) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 7212; class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 7209; class8.anInt200 = 7209; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Armadyl Godsword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@".getBytes(); }

change the @@@ at the end to the text you get when you examine the ags.
oh, and in line one, change the 35 to the ags ID, if it is 35 then leave it there.

Read full topic
